page.title: 14THE SHIELDS GAZETTE
page.content: The local evening newspaper is{The {Shields Gazette}which is one of the oldest provincial newspapers in the country. It was established in 1849. News of international and national importance is carried in "The Gazette" but news of local concern to the people of North and South Shields and South Tyneside fills much of the paper. The present Editor,{Mr.M.J.Blackah,} told us that the main concern of his readers is the high level of unemployment in the area. He thinks that we are beginning to pull out of the recession but it will take a long time. The wide coverage makes "The Shields Gazette" a very popular newspaper.
